title: Geospatial data in Python: Database, Desktop, and the Web part 2
summary: Using the wide range of tools and libraries available for working with geospatial data, it is now possible to transport geospatial data from a database to a web-interface in only a few lines of code. In this tutorial, we explore some of these libraries and work through examples which showcase the power of Python for geospatial data.
